name: We Slay Monsters
description: We Slay Monsters streamlines traditional roguelike RPG gameplay and introduces a unique poker-esque card based combat mechanic. Each class (Wizard, Rogue, Warrior) has a unique deck of cards; using this deck you will guide your hero through the dungeon.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities; generally everything made since 2004 should work
